education_text.0: James Alexander Hendler (born April 2, 1957) is an      Artificial intelligence artificial intelligence researcher at      Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute, United States, and one of the originators of the      Semantic Web Semantic WebHendler completed his      Doctor of Philosophy Doctor of Philosophy degree at      Brown University Brown University in 1986 with a thesis on      Automated planning and scheduling automated planning and schedulingHendler's research interests                   are in the semantic web                   and artificial intelligenceHe is a former member of the US Air Force Science Advisory Board and a former Chief Scientist of the Information Systems Office at the      US Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency (DARPA)
